definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: With the formal suits but humorous gestures, the Chorale made their first appearance.
sentences.chinese: 正式的着装，诙谐的动作，是该合唱团的出场秀。

sentences.english: Dress codes can work, but the assumption that clothing has a major.
sentences.chinese: 着衣准则确实有效，服装对着装者有主要的。

sentences.english: We rode on a huge horse. Grumdalclitch carried me in my box.
sentences.chinese: 我们骑在大马上，葛兰朵克丽琪则抱着装我的箱子。

sentences.english: Guards watch one document, only know that the ordinary people dress was president.
sentences.chinese: 卫兵一看证件，才知道这个普通着装的人竟是大总统。

sentences.english: If the company does not have a dress code, remember that its better to overdress than underdress.
sentences.chinese: 如果公司没有着装，记住其更好地外衣比内衣。

sentences.english: Won't the relaxed dress code damage the company image?
sentences.chinese: 难道这种善于便服的着装规定不会损害公司形象吗？

sentences.english: Well, I love your dressing style, especially your bracelet.
sentences.chinese: 还有，我很喜欢你的着装风格，尤其是你的手镯。

sentences.english: Dress code challenges like these have been cropping up for years.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的着装规范的问题已经出现好几年了。

sentences.english: Also, Google’s dress code is “You must wear clothes”.
sentences.chinese: 还有，谷歌的着装要求是“你必须穿衣服。

sentences.english: We just received the new dress code for my sixth-grader.
sentences.chinese: 我六年级的儿子刚发了学校着装规章。

sentences.english: I called, I went in for interviews, I got dressed up,
sentences.chinese: 我打电话，整理着装去面试。

sentences.english: She always dressed, even if she was just going to the market.
sentences.chinese: 她无时不着装打扮，即使去逛商店也是如此。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I may try to be more refined if I am going to fashion shows.
sentences.chinese: 如果要去参加时装秀，我会再多花些心思在着装上。

sentences.english: Small roads are impassable and people are wading chest high, towing small children in wooden canoes.
sentences.chinese: 人们在齐胸深的水中跋涉，拖着装在木盆里的小孩。

sentences.english: I have installed two sesame seed holding a small plastic bag while and enjoy the scenery while strolling.
sentences.chinese: 我拿着装了两个烧饼的小塑料袋边观赏美景边溜达。

sentences.english: You must find a balance between dressing for the job and dressing for the interview.
sentences.chinese: 你必须在工作着装和面试着装之间找到一个平衡。

definition: to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
